Title: MChat IRC
Description: MChat is a full "written-entirely-by-rstat1" .NET IRC client that requires .NET 3.5. Its user interface is made using WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MChat is a full "written-entirely-by-rstat1" .NET IRC client that requires .NET 3.5. Its user interface is made using WPF.

Note: This app is built on .NET 3.5 SP1. If you have issues running it please update your installation of .NET 3.5 to SP1.

Have any questions, comments, concerns, visit #mchat on irc.coldfront.net, and let me know.
